title: Ten Hag's List of Rules
description:
The FC crew continue to discuss Frenkie de Jong's future after the midfielder was linked with a move to Chelsea amid repeated interest from Manchester United. Plus, the guys take a trip down memory lane about previous times they had broken their coach's rules and react to Rodrygo's contract extension with Real Madrid until 2028.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: How does Ousmane Dembele's future affect Raphinha?; Erik ten Hag issues a list of rules for Man United players; Spain kick off Women's EURO with win over Finland
